content.title: Exciting Update & Stretch Goal !
content.creator:
Aceele
March 17, 2025
content.content:
Dear Aceele Backers,
We are thrilled to announce that, thanks to your incredible support, we have successfully reached  $160,000 in our crowdfunding campaign! This milestone would not have been possible without each and every one of you. To celebrate this achievement and aim even higher, we are introducing a  stretch goal!
